title: How to configure Orleans DI container to resolve a service with same instance per grain object graph?
body:
There is a more detailed explanation at:

http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/1099750/How-to-implement-DI-support-in-your-Orleans-Silo

It's important to know that you have to set the Startup Class in the configuration file of orleans.

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<OrleansConfiguration xmlns="urn:orleans">
  <Globals>
    <SeedNode Address="localhost" Port="10000" />
  </Globals>
  <Defaults>
    <Startup Type="Grains.Startup, Grains" /><!--important-->
    <Networking Address="localhost" Port="10000" />
    <ProxyingGateway Address="localhost" Port="30000" />
  </Defaults>
</OrleansConfiguration>
